title: Correction to: Parents' Translations of Child Gesture Facilitate Word Learning in Children with Autism, Down Syndrome and Typical Development.
text: The original version of the article unfortunately contained mistake in the "Methods/Participants" section (p. 224) as "[M TD = 168.26 (SD = 125.18) vs. M AU = 172.91 (SD = 195.88) vs. M DS = 145.43 (SD = 88.78); Kruskal-Wallis, χ 2(2) = 2.42, p = .30], and for word types [M TD = 28.43 (SD = 26.89) vs. M AU = 39.65 (SD = 49.07) vs. M DS = 18.35 (SD = 22.78); χ 2(2) = 3.15, p = .21]''. The correct text is given below: "[M TD = 51.91 (SD = 59.68) vs. M AU = 74.43 (SD = 116.01) vs. M DS = 25.26 (SD = 39.39); Kruskal-Wallis, χ 2(2) = 3.39, p = .18], and for word types [M TD = 18.48 (SD = 20.51) vs. M AU = 24.74 (SD = 32.98) vs. M DS  = 11.22 (SD = 18.87); χ 2(2) = 3.58, p = .17]"..
journal: Journal of autism and developmental disorders
authors: Department of Psychology, Georgia State University, P.O. Box 5010, Atlanta, GA, 30303-3083, USA. ndimitrova@gsu.edu.
